p: In addition, mention that theme specifications can “overwrite” some layout specification in the other part of the ggplot2 function. The use in this example of theme_bw appears to clarify what the default built-in theme is (complete themes: https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org/reference/ggtheme.html , other themes https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/ggthemes/ggthemes.pdf).
